name: School Of Mobile Computing and Communication
description: School of Mobile Computing and Communication started as Center for Mobile Computing and Communication and was declared as Center for Excellence by UGC. The center has been promoted to School of Mobile Computing and Communication in 2006. The school has an objective of promoting study and research activities in various areas of Mobile Computing and Distributed Computing. An AICTE-approved 2-year Post-Graduate Degree Course on Distributed & Mobile Computing is being offered from 2006 academic session. In addition, the School regularly organizes short term courses in Mobile and Distributed Computing.
